title: Where to find custom build in the menu ?
body: I actually never played since the new update of menu but i cant find the custom build option in the menu . {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Custom items sets are still being ironed out for the updated client. While you aren't able to create item sets on the new client yet, you are still able to use them! You can find more information on our [Updated Client Features](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ#h2q1) page.

Let me know if you've got any questions!
